q: a November 2010, speech to the Detroit Economic Club, Mike Pence of Indiana, who is said to be exploring a White House bid, made an explicit connection between American free enterprise, exceptionalism and Christianity. The free market is what made America's economy the greatest in the world, Mike Pence declared.`` To renew American exceptionalism, we must recognize that our present crisis is not merely economic, but moral in nature... Report Abuse I sincerely hope the Egyptian people eventually will win their freedom. However, the Cairo museum is one of the world's greatest museums. It's artifacts are beyond price. They are the cultural heritage of the Egyptian people representing one of the world's earliest and greatest civilizations. It would be a tragedy for Egypt and it's people if the Cairo Museum were looted and trashed like the Bagdad Museum. Report Abuse " Headline:`` Egypt's museums and monuments are deserted'' "
